content: are you in full swing of making christmas gnomes right now or you are just starting out i can assure you that the crochet gnome wine bottle cover pattern will soon become your favorite first of all it s one of these easy crochet projects for gifts that can be made with just about any yarn you have on hand and did i mention it s a fantastic stash-buster go gather all the scraps of yarn you have been accumulating over the years i have made samples with dk worsted bulky and super bulky yarn and they all turned out great inside the pdf you will find instructions for any yarn and any hook let s look at the advantage of the gnome bottle topper it s small and makes a super fast project very easy crochet pattern great for beginners to get acquainted with crocheting in a spiral perfect for last-minute gifts or add a personal funny handmade touch to a boring gift great for selling at craft fairs during the busy christmas shopping time amazing stash-busting project - easy crochet christmas gift and also makes a great stocking stuffer
